content: this is my first attempt on here to write a pattern i wanted to create a mushroom hat that had a lot of physicality and character to it after seeing some inspiration at a convention recently the fit is a little loose it is more designed for looks than function though it did sit nicely on my head while outside in light winds it includes instructions to downsize as well as the fit will likely be loose on anyone who has a smaller head my size is 7 3/4 the pattern uses a fairly even mix of the red and white skeins
